metadata.Title: CVE-2025-30348 affecting package qtbase for versions less than 6.6.3-3
metadata.Description: CVE-2025-30348 affecting package qtbase for versions less than 6.6.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

criterion.comment: Package qtbase is earlier than 6.6.3-3, affected by CVE-2025-30348
